alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 17 at 1:42AM CDT until June 17 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 379 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 4 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST KANSAS ATCHISON KS DONIPHAN IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSOURI CALDWELL CARROLL DAVIESS GRUNDY HARRISON LIVINGSTON MERCER IN NORTHWEST MISSOURI ANDREW ATCHISON MO BUCHANAN CLINTON DEKALB GENTRY HOLT NODAWAY WORTH IN WEST CENTRAL MISSOURI RAY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBANY, ATCHISON, BETHANY, BRAYMER, BRECKENRIDGE, CAMERON, CARROLLTON, CHILLICOTHE, CLARKSDALE, COUNTRY CLUB VILLA, CRAIG, ELWOOD, FAIRFAX, FOREST CITY, GALLATIN, GRANT CITY, HAMILTON, HIGHLAND, JAMESPORT, KING CITY, LATHROP, LAWSON, MAITLAND, MARYVILLE, MAYSVILLE, MERCER, MOUND CITY, OREGON, OSBORN, PLATTSBURG, POLO, PRINCETON, RICHMOND, ROCK PORT, SAVANNAH, ST. JOSEPH, ST. JOSEPH AIRPORT, STANBERRY, STEWARTSVILLE, TARKIO, TRENTON, TROY, UNION STAR, AND WATHENA.
